Some text

> Hello world
>  Foo {MD027}
>  Bar {MD027}

This tests other things embedded in the blockquote:

> *Hello world*
>  *foo* {MD027}
>  **bar** {MD027}
>   "Baz" {MD027}
> *foo*
> **bar**
> 'baz'

Test the first line being indented too much:

>  Foo {MD027}
>  Bar {MD027}
> Baz
